0.title: Easy Roasted Dry-Brined Turkey
ingredients: 1 14-pound turkey, neck and heart reserved for Easy Turkey Stock

1.title: Easy Mixed-Cheese Quic  he Recipe
ingredients: 1/2 recipe Easy Pie Dough, rolled out to a 12-inch circle (see note above)
8 ounces mixed rindless soft and semi-soft cheeses (such as Gruyere, Fontina, Cheddar, Gorgonzola, Stilton, Jack, etc.), cubed or broken into small clumps

2.title: "Sweet Heat" Grilled Prosciutto and Smoked Gouda Sandwich (with spicy plum chutney and crispy onions)
ingredients: Butter, at room temperature for easy spreading

4.title: Savory Egg Crostata with Butter and Mint recipes
ingredients: 1 tablespoon fresh mint leaves, thinly sliced
1 disk (1/2 recipe) Easy Cream Cheese Pie Dough, chilled at least 20 minutes

6.title: Shrimp with Chesapeake Dipping Sauce
ingredients: 2¾ lb. large raw easy-to-peel cleaned shrimp

7.title: 3 Ingredient Homemade Chocolate Covered Raisins recipes
ingredients: 1/4 cup dark chocolate chips (I use organic because it tastes so much better!)
1/2 tbsp coconut oil (it really thins out the chocolate and makes it easy to coat)

8.title: Eggs Benedict and Easy Hollandaise Sauce
ingredients: 2 English muffins, sliced in half and toasted
2 extra-large egg yolks, at room temperature

9.title: Easy Tomato and Smoked Feta Tart Recipe
ingredients: 5 ounces block feta cheese, with 1 cup of its brine (see note above)
1 1/2 pounds ripe beefsteak tomatoes (about 2 large), cut into slices
1/2 pound cherry tomatoes, split in half
2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, plus more for finishing
1 tablespoon minced fresh oregano, marjoram, and/or thyme leaves
2 tablespoons minced fresh delicate herbs, such as parsley, mint, basil, tarragon, and/or chives
